representedCustodianOrganization.name: APHL | Association of Public Health Laboratories.

text.paragraph: Public Health Reporting Communication: one or more conditions are reportable, or may be reportable, to public health.

act.text: Public Health Reporting Communication: one or more conditions are reportable, or may be reportable, to public health.

code.displayName: Initial case report processing information Document

text.paragraph: Your organization electronically submitted an initial case report to determine if reporting to public health is needed for a patient.

"Gonorrhea (disorder)" is reportable to "Utah Department of Health". The initial case report was sent to "Utah Department of Health". Additional information may be required for this report."Chlamydial infection (disorder)" is reportable to "Utah Department of Health". The initial case report was sent to "Utah Department of Health". Additional information may be required for this report."Disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (disorder)" is reportable to "Utah Department of Health". The initial case report was sent to "Utah Department of Health". Additional information may be required for this report.
Reporting is required within "1 Day(s)". Reporting to this Public Health Agency is based on "Both patient home address and provider facility address"

code.displayName: Both patient home address and provider facility address

observation.value: All results of tests for detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae nucleic acid in a clinical specimen by any method (i.e., ‘all’ nucleic acid test results)

Detection of Neisseria gonorrhoeae nucleic acid by any method in a clinical specimen, including the following methods: - nucleic acid by hybridization with a nucleic acid probe - nucleic acid amplification (e.g., PCR)
